revised_title: Piezoelectric Stoneley Waves in Bonded Piezoelectric Half-Spaces
tldr: The authors investigate the existence and properties of interfacial (Stoneley) waves in bonded piezoelectric half-spaces. They introduce a new definition of the piezoelectric limiting speed and use the piezoelectric interfacial impedance tensor to show that a maximum of two subsonic Stoneley waves can occur. A definite existence criterion for a single subsonic piezoelectric Stoneley mode is given, and a numerical scheme for finding Stoneley modes is presented.
